sage.scene.shape

Class Teapot

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scene.SceneNode
      • sage.scene.Leaf
        • sage.scene.shape.Polyhedron3D
          • sage.scene.shape.Teapot

  • public class Teapot
extends Polyhedron3D
    This class defines the classic "Newell Teapot" (Google it). Teapot is defined as a subclass of Polyhedron3D in order that it may be treated as any other 3D SAGE SceneNode type. The color of a teapot can be changed with a call to Polyhedron3D.setColor(Color). The default size of the teapot is defined by the IRenderer used to draw the teapot; SceneNode.scale(float, float, float) can be used to adjust the teapot size.
    Author:
    John Clevenger

      • Teapot

        public Teapot(java.lang.String name,
              boolean isSolid,
              float size,
              java.awt.Color color)
        Constructs either a solid or a wire-frame teapot with the specified name, size, and color. The teapot is assigned a default BoundingVolume of type BoundingSphere with a radius of sqrt(2).

    • Method Detail

      • updateLocalBound

        public void updateLocalBound()
        Description copied from class: Leaf
        updateLocalBound() computes a new local bounding volume for this Leaf by re-examining the vertex data for the leaf. This method is specified by this class (and also by the parent SceneNode class) but must be implemented by any derived classes since the abstract Leaf class can't know what the subclass data looks like (and hence can't know how to compute the bounding volume).
        Overrides:
        updateLocalBound in class Polyhedron3D

      • draw

        public void draw(IRenderer renderer)
        Draws this Teapot object.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Polyhedron3D
        Parameters:
        renderer - - the IRenderer to be used to draw this Leaf.
